channel.title: Hi, I'm Aviv, currently working on deflect.io
channel.description:
Hey everyone! A few months ago I left my job and started working with a friend. We do part time freelancing and use the rest of the time to work on our own stuff. After an idea or two that didn't go too far we're currently working on [deflect.io][1], a tool for helping web and mobile developers.
It started from a tool we wrote for ourselves and figured it might be helpful to other developers as well. We put a landing page up a few days ago to start collecting emails and are working to get our first version out the door an into customers hands soon.
Both my partner and I are new to this whole thing (we're developers with no experience in marketing, sales and bootstrapping), and I'm happy to find a group of people going through the same kind of experiences :)
Cheers!
[1]: http://www.deflect.io

item.title: Hi, I'm Aviv, currently working on deflect.io
item.dc:creator: avivby
item.description:
Hey everyone!
A few months ago I left my job and started working with a friend. We do part time freelancing and use the rest of the time to work on our own stuff. After an idea or two that didn’t go too far we’re currently working on deflect.io, a tool for helping web and mobile developers.

It started from a tool we wrote for ourselves and figured it might be helpful to other developers as well. We put a landing page up a few days ago to start collecting emails and are working to get our first version out the door an into customers hands soon.

Both my partner and I are new to this whole thing (we’re developers with no experience in marketing, sales and bootstrapping), and I’m happy to find a group of people going through the same kind of experiences

Cheers!

Read full topic
